trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Visalia
There were no other sightings in Visalia on or around May 4th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI was about a block away from cos college at a friends house.i noticed this bright ball moving across the sky and at a steady pace also followed by another one about 300 yards apart.I had no idea what it was.The obejects were bright orange with a little red to them.Both seemed to be moving at slower speed than normal aircraft.I really didnt think much of it until i searched the web to see if anybody else had seen them.Thats when i found that somebody had seen the similar objects on May 1st in the same area over the college.I lost sight as it went pass the treeline in the distance.
Summary: round glowing object with no blinking safety lights like a airplane or helicopter.
